content: is there such a thing as  vimeo sync adapter; also github ; kickstarter ; Yahoo social sync/Flickr ?

Yes, there are sync adapters available for platforms like Vimeo, GitHub, Kickstarter, Yahoo Social Sync (which includes Flickr). These sync adapters are software components that allow applications to synchronize data with corresponding services. Developers can use these adapters to integrate the functionalities of these platforms into their own applications.
